XXLChess

类 Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXLChess.Board
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Board class represents the game board for XXLChess. It contains a matrix of tiles, collections of player and enemy pieces, and provides methods for initializing the board, setting up the pieces, and cloning the board for AI algorithms.

      • clone

        public Board clone()
        Clones the Board object.
        覆盖:
        clone 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        A cloned copy of the Board object.

      • initializeBoard

        public void initializeBoard(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Initializes the game board.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet object for rendering.

      • gereratePiece

        public void gereratePiece()
        Generates all the tiles on the board

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece(java.lang.String layout,
                     java.lang.String playerIsWhite)
        Sets up the pieces on the board based on the provided layout.
        参数:
        layout - The layout file specifying the positions of the pieces.
        playerIsWhite - The color of the player's pieces ("white" or "black").

      • playerLegalMove1

        public java.util.ArrayList<Piece> playerLegalMove1(Piece playerKing,
                                                   Piece currentCheckEnemy)
        Determines the legal moves for all player piece to block or capture the checking piece.
        参数:
        playerKing - The player's king piece.
        currentCheckEnemy - The piece that is checking the player's king.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of pieces that can legally move to block or capture the checking piece.

      • playerLegalMove2

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tile> playerLegalMove2(Piece playerKing,
                                                  Piece currentCheckEnemy)
        Determines the legal moves for all player piece to block or capture the checking piece.
        参数:
        playerKing - The player's king piece.
        currentCheckEnemy - The piece that is checking the player's king.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of tiles that a piece can legally move to block or capture the checking piece.

      • enemyLegalMove1

        public java.util.ArrayList<Piece> enemyLegalMove1(Piece enemyKing,
                                                  Piece currentCheckPlayer)
        Determines the legal moves for all enemy piece to block or capture the checking piece.
        参数:
        enemyKing - The player's king piece.
        currentCheckPlayer - The piece that is checking the enemy 's king.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of pieces that can legally move to block or capture the checking piece.

      • enemyLegalMove2

        public java.util.ArrayList<Tile> enemyLegalMove2(Piece enemyKing,
                                                 Piece currentCheckPlayer)
        Determines the legal moves for all enemy piece to block or capture the checking piece.
        参数:
        enemyKing - The enemy's king piece.
        currentCheckPlayer - The piece that is checking the enemy's king.
        返回:
        An ArrayList of tiles that a piece can legally move to block or capture the checking piece.

      • aiMove

        public Piece aiMove()
        Generates the AI move by selecting a piece from the enemy collection and determining its target tiles. If the piece has captured tiles, it is returned as the move. Otherwise, a random piece is selected, and if it has captured tiles or legal moves, it is returned as the move. The process continues until a suitable move is found.
        返回:
        The selected piece for the AI move.

      • aiMove2

        public Piece aiMove2()

      • pawnPromte

        public Piece pawnPromte(processing.core.PApplet app,
                        double speed,
                        int maxMoveTime)
        Promotes a pawn to a queen for both the player and enemy collections. If a pawn reaches the specific row of the board, it is replaced by a queen piece.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet instance for drawing.
        speed - The speed of the promoted queen.
        maxMoveTime - The maximum time allowed for the queen's move.
        返回:
        The promoted queen piece.

      • addAllTiles

        public void addAllTiles()
        Populates all tile collections for both player and enemy pieces. Updates the collections with the target tiles of the pieces.

      • Checking

        public boolean Checking(Piece piece)
        Checks if a piece is currently in a checking position.
        参数:
        piece - The piece to check for checking condition.
        返回:
        True if the piece is in a checking position, false otherwise.
